original_text: The Lord says, ‘You can hear a sad noise in Ramah. Someone is weeping with a loud voice. It is Rachel, and she is weeping for her children. Nobody can help her to stop weeping, because her children are dead.’ 31: Ramah was about 8 kilometres north of Jerusalem. It was on the road between Bethel and Bethlehem. The grave of Jacob's wife, Rachel, was there. She was the mother of Joseph. Joseph's two children were Ephraim and Manasseh. See Genesis 41:50-51. Also see Matthew 2:17-18. korean_text: 여호와께서 이와 같이 말씀하시니라 라마에서 슬퍼하며 통곡하는 소리가 들리니 라헬이 그 자식 때문에 애곡하는 것이라 그가 자식이 없어져서 위로 받기를 거절하는도다

sentences.original_text: You can hear a sad noise in Ramah
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 라마에서 슬픈 소리를 들을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: Someone is weeping with a loud voice
and she is weeping for her children
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 자녀들을 위해 울고 있다

sentences.original_text: Nobody can help her to stop weeping
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그녀가 울음을 멈추도록 도와줄 수 없다

sentences.original_text: Ramah was about 8 kilometres north of Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 라마는 예루살렘 북쪽 약 8킬로미터 지점에 있었다

sentences.original_text: It was on the road between Bethel and Bethlehem
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 베델과 베들레헴 사이의 길에 있었다

sentences.original_text: The grave of Jacob's wife, Rachel, was there
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱의 아내 라헬의 무덤이 그곳에 있었다

sentences.original_text: She was the mother of Joseph
Joseph's two children were Ephraim and Manasseh
